meanings.definition: The sound made by beating a drum.
meanings.sent1: The drumbeats echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The drummer played steady drumbeats during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mimicked the drumbeats with acorns on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced to the drumbeats of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic drumbeats filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: A series of drumbeats used to keep time or signal something.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers marched in perfect unison to the drumbeats.
meanings.sent2: The drumbeats of the tribal ceremony could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The drumbeats of the alarm clock woke him up with a start.
meanings.sent4: The drumbeats of change reverberated through the community.
meanings.sent5: The drumbeats of tradition guided their every move.
